item.title: Picking Up Game Programming
item.description: Even though I’ve been programming for a long time, I always make it a point to keep learning something new every year. This time around, I’ve started learning to how to build games.

item.title: About Butch Landingin
item.description: About Me I’m a programmer, interested in a lot of technology related topics. In particular, I’m interested in the following: AI, Machine Learning and Deep Learning Cryptography Cybersecurity Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies Games and Game development Agile Development Kubernetes and Cloud Services Programming Languages and Paradigms Programming Libraries and Frameworks Continuous Integration and DevOps UI and UX Lots of other stuff If you are not a bot, you can reach me at butchland [at] gmail [dot] com.
